alert.note: Alert for Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:07PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Orangeburg County through 900 PM EDT... At 807 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northeast of Blackville, or 14 miles north of Denmark, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orangeburg, Brookdale, Orangeburg County Airport, Claflin College, Edisto Gardens, South Carolina State University, North, Neeses, Norway, Rowesville, Cordova, Livingston, Cope, Wilkinson Heights, Prince of Orange Mall and Edisto. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 142 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
